CustomField.description: The unit used to track the service. For example: hours, meals, sessions, deliveries, kits, etc. Defining a Unit of Measurement standardizes how you measure the delivery of the service.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The unit used to track the service. For example: hours, meals, sessions, deliveries, kits, etc. Defining a Unit of Measurement standardizes how you measure the delivery of the service.
CustomField.label: Unit of Measurement
